Description:
You arrive at a crumbling watchtower, this tower was the first point of defense in the Wolf Wars against the wild werewolves of the forest.

When you enter the tower, your eyes catch a dim light that filters under the rubble, it is a Golem! They were the best defenders Senenthia has ever known, but they were dismantled after the war and it was thought that there were no more left.

The power supply seems to be damaged, maybe if you can find a replacement for the core, you can repair it.
DescriptionAction: It's up to you to repair it.

    "SSRewardText": "(Evelyn) \"She told me that, when she was young, she visited the Black Forge and learned how the dwarves forged various types of golems. Thanks to that knowledge and her powers, she created a few golems to defend the kingdom in the Wolf Wars.\n\nIf we want to restore it, we have to go to the Black Forge, in the Velkarath mountains.\"\n\nAs you hide the golem, so that it does not suffer any more damage, you find a few magic shards.",

    "SSRewardText": "(Amelia) \"Even when I ordered it to be dismantled, we could use its help. Unfortunately right now my powers are too unstable to make it work... maybe if we find something similar to its original source we could reactivate it.\n\n\nThe black forge is sealed... but perhaps in its surroundings we can obtain a core that we can use to activate it.\"\n\nAs you hide the golem, so that it does not suffer any more damage, you find a few magic shards.",
